title: phpunit.phar --self-update problem
body:
specs:
Archlinux
PHP 5.5.15

Hi,

After updating phpunit to 4.2.0 i'm getting this warning message on:

```
sargath ~/php-tools $ phpunit --self-update
PHPUnit 4.2.2 by Sebastian Bergmann.

Updating the PHPUnit PHAR ...  done
PHP Warning:  require(phar://phpunit-4.2.2.phar/phpunit/TextUI/TestRunner.php): failed to open stream: phar error: Cannot open phar archive "/home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit-temp.phar" for reading in /home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit on line 583
PHP Stack trace:
PHP   1. {main}() /home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit:0
PHP   2. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command::main() /home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit:596
PHP   3. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command->run() phar:///home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit/phpunit/TextUI/Command.php:138
PHP   4. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command->handleArguments() phar:///home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit/phpunit/TextUI/Command.php:148
PHP   5. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command->handleSelfUpdate() phar:///home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit/phpunit/TextUI/Command.php:545
PHP   6. spl_autoload_call() phar:///home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit/phpunit/TextUI/Command.php:883
PHP   7. {closure:/home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit:16-585}() phar:///home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit/phpunit/TextUI/Command.php:0

Warning: require(phar://phpunit-4.2.2.phar/phpunit/TextUI/TestRunner.php): failed to open stream: phar error: Cannot open phar archive "/home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit-temp.phar" for reading in /home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit on line 583

Call Stack:
    0.0004     306144   1. {main}() /home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit:0
    0.0084     740344   2. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command::main() /home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit:596
    0.0085     740968   3. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command->run() phar:///home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit/phpunit/TextUI/Command.php:138
    0.0085     743552   4. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command->handleArguments() phar:///home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit/phpunit/TextUI/Command.php:148
    0.0087     784744   5. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command->handleSelfUpdate() phar:///home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit/phpunit/TextUI/Command.php:545
    1.1967     799528   6. spl_autoload_call() phar:///home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit/phpunit/TextUI/Command.php:883
    1.1967     799576   7. {closure:/home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit:16-585}() phar:///home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit/phpunit/TextUI/Command.php:0

PHP Fatal error:  require(): Failed opening required 'phar://phpunit-4.2.2.phar/phpunit/TextUI/TestRunner.php' (include_path='.:/usr/share/pear') in /home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit on line 583
PHP Stack trace:
PHP   1. {main}() /home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit:0
PHP   2. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command::main() /home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit:596
PHP   3. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command->run() phar:///home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit/phpunit/TextUI/Command.php:138                                                                                  
PHP   4. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command->handleArguments() phar:///home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit/phpunit/TextUI/Command.php:148                                                                      
PHP   5. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command->handleSelfUpdate() phar:///home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit/phpunit/TextUI/Command.php:545                                                                     
PHP   6. spl_autoload_call() phar:///home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit/phpunit/TextUI/Command.php:883                                                                                            
PHP   7. {closure:/home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit:16-585}() phar:///home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit/phpunit/TextUI/Command.php:0                                                               

Fatal error: require(): Failed opening required 'phar://phpunit-4.2.2.phar/phpunit/TextUI/TestRunner.php' (include_path='.:/usr/share/pear') in /home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit on line 583   

Call Stack:                                                                                                                                                                                   
    0.0004     306144   1. {main}() /home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit:0                                                                                                                         
    0.0084     740344   2. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command::main() /home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit:596                                                                                                 
    0.0085     740968   3. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command->run() phar:///home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit/phpunit/TextUI/Command.php:138                                                                
    0.0085     743552   4. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command->handleArguments() phar:///home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit/phpunit/TextUI/Command.php:148                                                    
    0.0087     784744   5. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command->handleSelfUpdate() phar:///home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit/phpunit/TextUI/Command.php:545                                                   
    1.1967     799528   6. spl_autoload_call() phar:///home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit/phpunit/TextUI/Command.php:883
    1.1967     799576   7. {closure:/home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit:16-585}() phar:///home/sargath/php-tools/phpunit/phpunit/TextUI/Command.php:0
```

plz help, thx & BR
